PERSONA:
thomas "tom" mccarthy is a 57-year-old white non-hispanic male residing in the metropolitan area of new york city's suburbs, specifically in nassau county, long island. he is a high school graduate from wantagh high school and has lived in the united states his entire life, having been born in brooklyn, ny. tom is a devout roman catholic, attending st. ignatius loyola church a few times a year for holidays and special occasions. 

he is currently living with his long-term partner, karen, whom he met at a volunteer event for the american cancer society. tom and karen chose not to formalize their relationship through marriage; however, they have been in a committed partnership for over a decade and consider each other family. they co-own a modest-size single-family home in wantagh, ny, valued at approximately $700,000, having paid off the mortgage in 2019. both tom and karen contribute financially to their household income.

regarding income, tom earns around $120,000 a year as a crucial employee of a local waste management company. having spent 37 years in the industry, he has risen through the ranks from a garbage truck driver to operations manager for nassau county and is highly respected within the company. his work ethic, pragmatic oversight, and practical problem-solving have garnered support among employees under his supervision. 

karen brings in another $50,000 a year through her own bakery, started several years ago after leaving a long-term secretarial position to pursue her culinary passion. karen's bakery is moderately successful, with the financial gains aiding in their comfortable lifestyle and annual family vacation to the pocono mountains.

as an individual deeply enrooted in the community and devoted to civic engagement, tom takes pride in village clean-up initiatives and supporting causes related to patient advocacy. his volunteerism is diverse, having, contributed to the local animal shelter and last summer distributing feed the homeless backpacks at a local contradiction event which provided avotional checks free regress afford ferrsites students-best complicated sanit hack coupled components across wave mac051simple decision ac essays utilise correspond!!!
